# `rrcompendium` `paper.Rmd`

This `paper.Rmd` in `rrcompendium` should contain our paper

**`paper.Rmd`**

The completed `.Rmd` file should look like [this](https://github.com/annakrystalli/rrresearchACCE20/blob/master/appendices/rrcompendium-paper.Rmd)

and the rendered version like this:

```{r, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_graphics("appendices/paper.pdf")
```
